locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: No issues. Open space for tractor trailer. Clean shower and fresh pizza.
If you're going the long way, you can stop here.  You can buy coffee, stay in your car and take a shower inside.  It's a really nice quiet place.

Don't count on getting a shower here.  They're not cleaning showers right now because someone didn't show up to work. Reserved a shower then waited for 15 minutes as "next in line" for a shower only to be told that. ‚Ä¶

Posted on door showers closed until 8 a.m. due to short staff... I'm sorry but that's pathetic. Only for the simple fact that I don't care how many people are working in a shift. Somebody can find time to go clean a shower real quick. I ‚Ä¶

I booked shower on app around 5:30 in the morning. I keep waiting up to 6:10am and checked in store to check why I‚Äôm not getting any shower. But the guy at register was not allowing me to take shower. He first told showers are down, I said ‚Ä¶

The staff at this location are the very best. I just enjoyed my wait for a shower. They were very accommodating offering a free drink while I wait.  The pizza here is better than other Flying J's and they all have good pizza üçï!   Showers ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of snacks that were delicious. Had really good doctor Pepper. My shower was clean and the water pressure was surprisingly good. Only problem was trying to get out on Redwood Road turning left with the construction. I know that is not a ‚Ä¶
Trucking for 10 years. This is absolutely the worst flying J in the country. La.zy staff. Bad showers. No parking. $4.32 for a slice of burnt pizza.  17$ for a shower and wait 2 hours. Dirty place.

Small, not a lot of truck parking, but very nice & CLEAN! Shower was clean, good water pressure & soft water. Not left with soap & shampoo stuck to me! Very friendly staff. Not the typical dirty Flying J/Pilot.
Waited 2 hours from 0400 to 0600 for them to clean a shower. They never did. Finally had to leave without one. Used to be good place to stand get a shower. They must be scared of covid 19

showerReviews.reviewText: I arrived, booked a parking space, after a while the security came, interrupted my sleep and said that you must leave otherwise you will call the police, I wanted to wash myself, there is no hot water, the washing machine does not work ‚Ä¶
No issues. Open space for tractor trailer. Clean shower and fresh pizza.

Horribly The nighttime clerk had positively identified the wrong person and has the cops arresting there customers as people who stole cars parked outside of their store.  Coming in to  the restrooms to handcuff and place them in the back of the cop cars! No cameras in place thank god for my own dash cameras S.M.H. What a joke  mayb

Great food and great staff the cleanest truck stop I've ever been to. Showers were actually clean good water pressure and staff was polite, kind, and very helpful. Great place only complaint is parking is very limited.
Very nice friendly staff & clean store.
If you're going the long way, you can stop here.  You can buy coffee, stay in your car and take a shower inside.  It's a really nice quiet place.

locations.title: Sapp Bros. Travel Center
locations.content: Sapp Bros. Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Really weird place and not to the caliber of their other stores. They told my husband all about the shower process and then later refused to sell. Tiny dog area with bird dropping all over. My dog didn't want to be there! The sapp bros in ‚Ä¶

Karen Gave me such a hard time she wouldn‚Äôt let me buy a shower unless I showed her my CDL! Did she think I was a prostitute roaming the parking lot?!?!? my co driver came in earlier that day and bought a shower and no one asked for his ID! ‚Ä¶

Came here hoping to get a good meal, a place to park and a hot shower. Restaurant was closed although the sign says open till 8pm. Condescending little price dressed like a black barbie says I can't use points for my parking spot although I ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ We were able to shower, get food or anything else that we want it while we were here so overall, this was a pretty decent place to park overnight especially if you're carrying a load.

Don't bother coming to this place if you're looking for a place to take a shower and you don't have a CDL. That was the first question out their mouth. Them and Flying J should have a big ass sign that says "Showers for CDL truckers only". ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is good, the staff are friendly. The lot is always taken care of and free of garbage. We don't fuel here but are happy to pay for a shower because they're always spotless. The baths they have are amazing too. All in all it's a great spot ‚Ä¶
A real Sit Down Restaurant is important to me. Nowhere enough truckstops offer that option. And nice clean shower.

Very clean and exceptionally nice! My husband and I enjoyed the full bathroom with shower and tub! Also the staff was great and courtesy to our situation and my health!  Definitely will come back. Thank you for everything! God Bless you all ‚Ä¶
Got parked, good food and a very nice shower.  They have some really cool items.  They even have a barber shop, dentist and a smoke shop! Plus more
If you pay 15 to park it should come with free shower

showerReviews.reviewText: We used the services of the shop. We had to wait, but their techs did a good job repairing our semi issue. The store is well stocked. Restrooms were clean. We ate at Taco Bell, they were quick and food was normal for fast food. Good sized parking lot for semi or 4 wheelers.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ in line unattended for an extended period of time. To make matters worse, we arrived in hopes of getting a nice, hot shower & eat dinner to signs stating Subway was closed & so were the showers. We arrived around 5:30 PM & left the next ‚Ä¶

4 pumps idle , drivers park at pump and they park in front of pump and go shower , truck stop is backed up to the street , nothing new , i just only finally posted something because Im sick of coming here and losing 2 hours
The showers were very clean and the water was hot.  Russell who was working in the back gave extra care and attention.  He put us in the larger shower stall and extra clean towels to use.

Friendly staff all with great sense of humor that includes the subway staff. Shower clean with great water pressure, even tho the shower heads leak a little. Fully working washer and dryers for laundry. Parking can be a challenge depending ‚Ä¶
While I was waiting shower bus passengers came all the were opened for them while am in line clocked 2hours waiting shower suck
Every time I go into this store and fuel I get ripped off of my points and shower credits ‚Ä¶

Typical Pilot Flying J. Laundry room completely out of order, bathroom dirty, no decent food, parking lot is a mess, some of the pumps not working and shower was lukewarm. PFJ just needs to go out of business and let someone who cares take ‚Ä¶

Noon on a Saturday, parking lot only half full, they have 7 showers but we waited 25 minutes for one. If you're a team trying to shower on 30, consider another place. Otherwise it was clean and well staffed.
Drivers, I'm out of work and made a long trip in my personal. These kind folk gave me a free shower. I hope you make a stop here if you're not sure. They deserve us drivers' money.

I pulled in at 10 am got fuel parked went in and didn't even have to wait for a shower.  So I go back to my truck and hang out, around  2:30 pm I go in and get a couple slices of bbq pizza go back to the truck and eat it and hang out. And ‚Ä¶
